original_text: You try to get help from other nations. You run here and there to make new friends. You hoped for help from Assyria, but no help came. And you will get no help from Egypt either. You try to get help from other nations. You run here and there to make new friends. You hoped for help from Assyria, but no help came. And you will get no help from Egypt either. You try to get help from other nations. You run here and there to make new friends. You hoped for help from Assyria, but no help came. And you will get no help from Egypt either. You try to get help from other nations. You run here and there to make new friends. You hoped for help from Assyria, but no help came. And you will get no help from Egypt either. You try to get help from other nations. You run here and there to make new friends. You hoped for help from Assyria, but no help came. And you will get no help from Egypt either. You try to get help from other nations.
korean_text: 네가 어찌하여 네 길을 바꾸어 부지런히 돌아다니느냐 네가 앗수르로 말미암아 수치를 당함 같이 또한 애굽으로 말미암아 수치를 당할 것이라

sentences.original_text: You try to get help from other nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 나라로부터 도움을 얻으려고 합니다.

sentences.original_text: You run here and there to make new friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 새로운 친구를 사귀기 위해 이리저리 뛰어다닙니다.

sentences.original_text: You hoped for help from Assyria,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 앗수르로부터 도움을 바랐지만,

sentences.original_text: but no help came.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무 도움도 오지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: And you will get no help from Egypt either.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 애굽으로부터도 도움을 얻지 못할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You try to get help from other nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 나라로부터 도움을 얻으려고 합니다.
